JULY 10, 1875.]
THE TIMBER TRADES JOURNAL.
23

Gothenburg,—3,777 pcs. pit props, Hunter & Erickson. Carlskrona @ Gothenburg,—548 pcs. pit props, 2½ fms. lathwood, Order.
June 30. Dohl Soaskarde @ Drammen,—4199 pcs. pit props, Order.
July 1. Helme Fredrika @ Christiansand,—staves, Order. Johanna @ Drontheim,—5,650 battens, Order. Reedar @ Gefle,—9,638 pit props, Hall Bros. Prospect @ Gefle,—9,787 pcs. pit props, P. Osbeck; a qnty. staves, James Black & Co. Jens Mondbergs Minde @ Laurvig,—3,890 pcs. battens, Order. Jens Gustav @ Gothenburg,—a qnty. bgd. sleepers, 30 wood knees, Syman, Bell & Co.; a qnty. mining and pit props, P. Osbeck; a qnty. staves, James Black & Co. boards, Hardy Bros.
July 2. Tvende Familier @ Christiansand,—77,000 pcs. staves, Order. Sophie @ Memel,—8,612 pcs. deals, Order. Castor @ W. Southern & Sons. Juliane @ Laurvig,—11,633 pcs. props, 1,410 battens, Hall Bros. Christian @ Drontheim,—crown trees, 1,410 battens, Hall Bros. Sophie Frederik @ Memel,—staves, James Black & Co. Sylphiden @ Gothenburg,—battens, Hardy Bros. Schroder @ Memel,—3,714 pcs. deals, Geisini Schroder @ Calmar,—5,409 pcs. pit props, J. Carr & Son.
July 3. Carl Victor @ Christiania,—1,175 pcs. sleepers, Order. Gode Haal @ Fredrikshald,—28,024 pcs. sleepers, Order.
July 5. Walhalla @ Laurvig,—15,224 pit props, Order. Porsgrund,—18,033 poles, 568 props, Peacock Bros. Cathrine @ Laurvig,—1,331 pcs. mining timber, 852 pcs. props, Order. Skutskar,—4,806 pcs. deals, battens, Order. Charlotte Slite,—306,650 pcs. staves, 45,045 pcs. deals, Order. Atlas @ Sundswall,—5,533 pcs. deals, James Black & Co. Johanna @ Sundswall,—1,141 pcs. boards, Hardy Bros.
July 5. Phoenix @ Sundswall,—402,096 pcs. staves, Order. Cort Adeler @ Laurvig,—911 pcs. props, 2,248 pcs. battens, Syman, Bell & Co. Active @ Christiansand,—114,000 pcs. staves, Wm. Southern & Son. Cornucopia @ Gothenburg,—17,618 pcs. pit props, Order. Oneke @ Slite,—199,881 pcs. staves, J. Black & Co. Olga @ Christianople,—5,367 pcs. pit props, Bell & Co.
July 6. Antagonist @ Nyvik,—423 pcs. deals, 6,380 pcs. boards, T. C. Hardy & Co. Jenne Fernand @ Drammen,—8,797 pcs. pit props, Syman, Bell & Co. Antor @ Christiansand,—18,406 pcs. pit props, Order. Electo @ Christiansand,—8,006 pcs. battens, Order. James Black & Co. Oder @ Drammen,—8,773 pcs. pit props, 31 battens, James Black & Co. 3,533 pcs. battens, Hardy Bros. Dolly @ Danzig,—630 pcs. whitewood timber, 253 fir sleepers, 4 fms. lathwood, 1,020 fir treenails, A. Hood & Co. Bosphorus @ Quebec,—29 pcs. red pine, 1,020 pcs. oak, 28 pcs. elm, 7 pcs. hickory, 29 pcs. red pine deals, 600 pcs. pine deals, 600 pcs. pine deal ends, V. and C. Burwup. Eleanora @ Sundswall,—7,112 deals, W. and C. Burwup. Marie Julie @ Memel,—106 pcs. timber, J. P. Sword.
July 7. Levant @ Gefle,—6,713 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, W. and C. Burwup. Eleanora @ Sundswall,—7,112 deals, W. and C. Burwup. Marie Julie @ Memel,—106 pcs. timber, J. P. Sword. Marie Julie @ Memel,—106 pcs. timber, 566 deals, 300 staves, 4 fms. lathwood.

BRISTOL.
June 28. Willie McLaren @ Georgetown, P.E.I.,—1,290 deals, Order. Harmony @ St. John,—14,241 pcs. deals, Order. Camilla @ Stettin,—949 deal ends, 10,000 palings, Jones & Co. Order. Calypso (s) @ Bordeaux,—pit props, Order.
July 1. Calypso (s) @ Bordeaux,—pit props, Order. Camilla @ Stettin,—626 pcs. timber, Taylor & Co.

WEST HARTLEPOOL.
June 24. Avenir @ Memel,—3,000 pcs. oak pipe staves, R. Wade, Sons & Co.
June 25. St. Hilda @ Riga,—6,178 square sleepers, 512 half square sleepers, 8 fms. firewood, R. Wade, Sons & Co.
June 26. Nil.
June 28. Sweden (ss) @ Riga,—5,598 square sleepers, 609 half square sleepers, P. Land & Co.
June 29. Idog @ Sundswall,—7,158 pcs. deals and battens, J. Rhodes & Co.
June 30. Scandinav @ Gefle,—16,242 pcs. deals and battens, J. Rhodes & Co. Nottingham, Theodor @ Gefle,—18,434 deals, and boards, T. Walker & Co. Eleanor Dobson @ Riga,—7,215 pcs. deal and deal ends, Harrison & Singleton. Commandeur of Sharon @ Riga, —7,047 pcs. deal and deal ends, Order.
July 1. Horening @ Gefle,—6,078 deals and boards, Order. Concord @ Soderhamn,—662 pcs. deals, 5,324 battens, 4,880 pcs. boards, J. Rhodes & Co. Maeives @ Memel,—10,226 oak staves, J. Rhodes & Co. Wilhelm @ Kotka,—4,216 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, J. Rhodes & Co.
July 2. Iduna @ Gefle,—9,841 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. Catherine @ Gefle,—8,221 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. Constance @ Gefle,—15,113 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. Idune @ Riga,—4,443 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, T. Walker & Co. Ivel @ Westerwick,—8,018 pcs. mining timber, 604 pcs. telegraph pole, E. S. Jobson & Co.
July 3. Antolina @ Soderhamn,—19,802 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, T. Walker & Co. Danmark @ Soderhamn,—6,643 pcs.

deals, J. Rhodes & Co. Lydia @ Soderhamn,—17,438 deals and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. H. P. Wilsson @ Skutskar,—deals, battens, and boards, Wm. Dawbarn & Co. Osnabruck @ Kramfors, 5,552 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, Order. Najaden @ Kramfors, 5,552 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, Order.
—19,620 oak staves, Order. Der Versuck @ Danzig,—900 pcs. deals and boards, J. Rhodes & Co.
Order. Beata @ Gefle,—4,214 pcs. deals, J. Rhodes & Co. Matilda @ Gefle,—14,911 pcs. battens and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. Matilda @ Gefle,—6,330 pcs. deals, Harrison & Singleton. Matilda @ Memel,—6,330 pcs. deals, 350 pcs. board ends, 3,600 pcs. oak staves, R. Wade, Sons & Co. Der Versuck @ Danzig,—900 pcs. deals and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. Anna @ Holmstad,—3,772 pcs. deals, 647 half sleepers, Order. Anna @ Gefle,—19,751 pcs. deals and boards, T. Walker & Co. Palm @ Gefle,—16,436 pcs. deals and boards, T. Walker & Co. Clare Mathilde @ Riga,—16,436 pcs. deals and boards, T. Walker & Co.
July 5. Preciosa @ Laurvig,—1,340 pcs. square timber, E. S. Jobson & Co. Oscar @ Sundswall,—8,101 pcs. deals and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. Christine @ Ahlafors,—25,884 pcs. board ends, J. Rhodes & Co. Christine @ Ahlafors,—25,884 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. Nordsterjuen @ Skutskar,—13,201 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, R. Wade, Sons & Co. Rosalie Ahrens @ Riga,—5,300 pcs. deal ends, R. Wade Sons & Co. Neptun @ Riga 5,500 pcs. deal ends, J. Rhodes & Co.
July 6. Patriol @ Gefle,—9,695 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. Frans @ Gefle,—11,482 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, T. Walker & Co. Carl XI. @ Gefle,—6,895 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, T. Walker & Co. Carl XI. @ Gefle,—15,973 deals, battens, and boards, Order. John @ Gefle,—15,973 deals, battens, and boards, Clark & Co., Nottingham. Sleipner @ Ljusne,—18,175 pcs. deals and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. Rapid @ Wifstawarf,—6,381 pcs. deals and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. Brilliant @ Nyhamn,—6,381 pcs. deals and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. Maria @ Riga,—2,954 pcs. deals and ends, Jas. Rhodes & Co. Julius Henrich @ Riga,—7,340 pcs. deals and ends, Jas. Rhodes & Co. Hanna @ Danzig,—1,281 pcs. red fir timber, Jas. Rhodes & Co. Leda @ Memel,—666 pcs. red fir timber, R. Wade, Sons, & Co. Leda @ Memel,—600 pcs. oak pipe staves, 2,400 long barrel staves, 600 short barrel staves, Order. Atlas @ Sundsvall,—31,516 pcs. battens and boards, May & Hassell. Alcides @ Cronstadt,—6,533 pcs. deals and battens, May & Hassell. Hoppet @ Gefle,—2,755 deals and boards, May & Hassell. Brodre @ Gefle,—3,550 deals, battens, and boards, Order. Two Brodre @ Gefle,—867 pcs. fir sleepers, 115 pc. half fir sleepers, Order. Orion @ Rugenwald,—867 pcs. fir sleepers, 16,755 bdls. laths, R. Wade, Sons, & Co. Gitana (ss) @ Memphis @ Gefle,—8,092 pcs. deals, R. Wade, Sons, & Co. Gitana (ss) @ Gothenburg,—9,122 pcs. pit props, R. Wade, Sons & Co. M[?] @ Riga,—9,122 pcs. pit props, Harrison & Singleton.
July 7. Penelope @ Nyhamn,—9,558 pcs. deals, 238 pcs. red-wood square timber, Jas. Rhodes & Co. Courier (s) @ Skutskar,—20,814 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, R. Wade, Sons & Co. John Reay @ Aura @ Wifstawarf, pcs. deals, battens, and boards, R. Wade, Sons & Co. Aura @ Wifstawarf, Jemawick @ Riga,—3,013 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. Eli @ Riga,—3,013 lathwood, Order. Eli @ Riga,—6,029 pcs. deals, May & Hassell. King Fredericksham,—22,840 pcs. deals and boards, May & Hassell. King Oscar @ Ljusne,—8,959 pcs. deals, Jas. Rhodes & Co. Newcastle and Arendal Packet @ Arendal,—a full cargo of mining timber and props, R. Wade, Sons, & Co. Mary Louisa @ Gefle,—17,688 pcs. redwood deals, Harrison & Singleton. Betty @ Gefle,—6,029 pcs. battens and boards, Harrison & Singleton.

deals, battens, and boards, Woodward, Clark & Co., Nottingham. Othello @ Gefle,—10,109 pcs. deal battens, Jas. Rhodes & Co. Alice @ Gefle,—5,770 pcs. battens, Jas. Rhodes & Co. Memel,—9,693 pcs. battens and boards, Jas. Rhodes & Co. Memel,—4,300 pcs. fir sleepers, 4,800 pcs. fir timber, Jas. Rhodes & Co.

GRANGEMOUTH.
June 21. Frederick Wilhelm Jebens @ Danzig,—377 pcs. fir timber, 1,303 fir deals, 53 oak planks, 366 pcs. fir sleeper logs, 10 fathoms lathwood, James Brownlee. Mimmi @ Stockholm, 711 deals, 362 pcs. timber, Order.
June 24. Ouny @ Sandefjord,—4,666 pit props, J. & R. Cooper. Hakon Acdelsteen @ Drontheim,—5,291 deals, A. Thomson & Nephews.
June 29. Haabet @ Christiania,—4,604 pcs. props, J. T. Salvesen & Co; 106,738 pcs. staves, J. L. Johansen & Co. De Paul Amer-sin @ Riga,—741 pcs. timber, 358 deals, 102 deal ends, Alex. Thomson & Nephews.
June 30. Astrea @ Mandal,—4,949 pit props, J. T. Salvesen & Co. Auguste @ Riga,—692 pcs. timber, 550 deals and ends, Alex. Thomson & Nephews.
July 2. Forschritt @ Riga,—5,106 deals and ends, Order. Martin @ Riga,—791 pcs. timber, 497 deals and ends, Alex. Thomson & Nephews. Rap @ Sandefjord,—3,203 battens, Macpherson & McLaren. Vesta @ Dram,—7,342 battens, R. Melville & Co. Tvende Brodre @ Dram,—5,700 battens, R. Melville & Co.
July 3. Prinz Von Preussen @ Riga,—423 pcs. timber, 2,593 deals, 241 deal ends, Alex. Thomson & Nephews. Klinteberg @ Falkenberg,—4,120 pit props, J. T. Salvesen & Co.

LEITH.
June 24. Orient @ Konigsberg,—3 mille oak staves, Order.
June 28. Iceland @ Cronstadt,—50 loads lathwood, J. Smith & Co. Annie Laurie @ Quebec,—22 oak, 30 elm, 22 ash, 50 loads lathwood, Mitchell, Somerville & Co. Adriatic @ Quebec,—22 oak, 30 elm, 118 cherry, 36 ash, 50 loads lathwood, Mitchell, Somerville & Co. Experiment @ Sundswall,—18,940 deals, battens, W. Thomson & Co.
June 29. Alma @ Dram,—7,560 battens, R. Park & Co.
June 30. Fredrik @ Wyborg,—8,352 deals and battens, Mitchell, Somerville & Co.
